# SCNParticleEvent.collision

**Case**

Occurs when particles collide with scene geometry.

## Declaration

```swift
case collision
```

## Discussion

SceneKit calls your event handler block immediately after resolving the collision.

## Constants

- **SCNParticleEvent.birth**: Occurs when new particles spawn.
- **SCNParticleEvent.death**: Occurs when particles reach the end of their life span.

items.description: Occurs when particles reach the end of their life span.
